Uses of ContentProvider in android.test
 

Classes in android.test with type parameters of type ContentProvider
 class ProviderTestCase<T extends ContentProvider>
          Deprecated. this class extends InstrumentationTestCase but should extend AndroidTestCase. Use ProviderTestCase2, which corrects this problem, instead.
 class ProviderTestCase2<T extends ContentProvider>
          If you would like to test a single content provider with an InstrumentationTestCase, this provides some of the boiler plate in ProviderTestCase2.setUp() and AndroidTestCase.tearDown().
